author: Lakshit Sain
text:

I request the authorities that please help me in getting the refund amount from @goairlinesindia as it has been around a week passed but I have not got any response from @goairlinesindia .

author: Lakshit Sain
text:
@PMOIndia @DGCAIndia @HardeepSPuri 

out of my budget. In October, supreme court in its verdict ordered all the airline companies to refund the complete amount to passenger. Even after my repeated requests for the refund from the @goairlinesindia , they denied to pay the refund. https://t.co/h6mzasJhDa

author: Lakshit Sain
text:
@PMOIndia @DGCAIndia @HardeepSPuri
Then my interview was rescheduled on 18 July 2020. To travel to my interview centre at Mysore, I asked @goairlinesindia to reschedule my ticket and allow me to travel. But they didn't arranged the same and I had to book another flight ticket

author: Lakshit Sain
text:
@PMOIndia @DGCAIndia @HardeepSPuri 

Due to the from covid 19 , I booked the air ticket from Jaipur to Bangalore with @goairlinesindia in February 2020. But as the nationwide lockdown was imposed in March, my interview was postponed and the flight was cancelled.

author: Lakshit Sain
text:
not capable to fight any case against the airlines nor I can afford the loss of my amount. 

I request the concerned authorities to please help me getting the refund as per the Supreme court order.
